Common Macros
Installing commonly used wiki extensions is recommended way to improve the basic wiki functionalities with often used additional features.
To include them go to extensions.polarion.com/polarion/extensions/extension.jsp?extension=PE-174  and download the extension.



After downloading install the extension to Polarion by following the instructions. Normally extensions are installed by unzipping the content to the folder C:\Polarion\polarion\plugins, followed by a restart of the Polarion server.
Hint: Variables in WIki Scripting Tools are available out of the box in Rich Pages. (Variable names differ a little bit) If you want to use Wiki Scripting Variables in Wiki Pages you need to install this extension. For this training we need this extension to be installed.
